title: A Soldier came back from the Front

sources.title: A Soldier came back from the Front
sources.description:
Based on stories by S. Antonov. School teacher Nikolai Egorov returns from the front as a disabled person, who learns that his wife has died, leaving behind a little daughter, Nadya. He finds the strength to live on - for the sake of his daughter and for the sake of his native village, which needs to be revived. The villagers elect Nikolai as chairman. He begins to furiously raise his native land from the ashes...

IMDb: 7,6

Year of production: 1972

Director: Nikolay Gubenko
Scriptwriter: Vasily Shukshin
Composer: Vyacheslav Ovchinnikov
Cameraman: Elizbar Karavaev
Production designers: Sergey Voronkov, Ippolit Novoderezhkin

Cast: Irina Miroshnichenko, Mikhail Gluzsky, Nikolay Gubenko, Natalia Bondarchuk, Victor Filippov, Alevtina Rumyantseva, Ivan Kosykh, Fedor Odinokov, Lena Smirnova, Lyudmila Stoyanova, Misha Rodyakov, Ivan Sharin, Mikhail Selyutin, O. Larionova, German Poloskov
